remarks: Rule to change the bound variable in a maps-to function, using implicit substitution.  With a longer proof analogous to ~ cbvmpt , some distinct variable requirements could be eliminated.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Jun-2013.)
statement:
cbvmpt2v.1 $e |- ( x = z -> C = E ) $.
cbvmpt2v.2 $e |- ( y = w -> E = D ) $.
cbvmpt2v $p |- ( x e. A , y e. B |-> C ) = ( z e. A , w e. B |-> D ) $.
$d A w x y z $.
$d B w x y z $.
$d C w z $.
$d D x y $.
